summary:
This will build a bridge under Solitude.
You can cross the bridge with horse.
Access between Solitude and Windstad becomes convenient.
descriptionHtml:
You have to swim across the ocean in order to cross the Solitude and Windstad, even with horses.
This will build a straight bridge under Solitude Arch.
You are able to cross this bridge even sprint with horses.

Considering the view of the world, it has become a rising bridge so that the ship can pass.
Actually the ship never goes through here ... and this bridge will not rise again.

Conflict:
Realistic Solitude Arch
-The rock blocks the bridge. You will not cross.
author: camizo
